sentences.en: ...only one kilometre from the border.
sentences.cn: …距离边境只有1公里。

sentences.en: a kilometre and a half of bitumen
sentences.cn: 一公里半的柏油路面

sentences.en: After jogging a kilometre he was panting and sweating.
sentences.cn: 他慢跑了一公里,气吁吁地直出汗.

sentences.en: All other triangular routes will be scored with factor 1.75 per kilometre.
sentences.cn: 按照国际航联规则的三角航线(最短边距离不少于三边总和的28%),每公里2分.

sentences.en: Drive on for a kilometre; then take a right turn.
sentences.cn: 向前开一公里; 然后向右转.

sentences.en: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.cn: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

sentences.en: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.en: In one kilometre from the place he has run out of petrol.
sentences.cn: 在离家还有一公里的地方他的汽油用完了.

sentences.en: It seems to have lost an entire 40-kilometre-long flank in one catastrophic event, say the researchers.
sentences.cn: 研究人员说，它似乎在一次灾难性事件中已失去了长达40公里的整个侧翼。

sentences.en: It's about one kilometre from here to the store.
sentences.cn: 从这大约有一公里吧.

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: My home is half a kilometre away from here.
sentences.cn: 我家离这儿有半公里.

sentences.en: One kilometre is equivalent to two li.
sentences.cn: 1公里为2华里.

sentences.en: One thousand metres go to the kilometre.
sentences.cn: 一千米为一公里.

sentences.en: The first 13 kilometre line of the metro has opened on time.
sentences.cn: 首条13千米长的地铁按期开通.

sentences.en: The roads merge a kilometre ahead.
sentences.cn: 这两条道路在前面一公处汇合成一条大道.

sentences.en: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.cn: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.en: They were detected at depths of more than a kilometre in the sea.
sentences.cn: 它们是在海面下超过一公里深的地方被检测出来的。

sentences.en: We know sound travels about one kilometre in three seconds.
sentences.cn: 我们知道声音三秒钟传播一公里左右.

sentences.en: Winston had never been inside the Ministry of Love, nor within half a kilometre of it.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿从来没进过爱护部, 连半公里之内也没到过.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres
